feature.title: What comes with Solitar?
feature.subtitle: Everything you need when work with URLs

speed.title: Blazingly Fast
speed.description: Instant redirects with zero latency. No middleman pages or ad-interstitials.

analytics.title: Privacy-Focused Analytics
analytics.description: Track click counts and referrers without harvesting personal user data.

api.title: Developer First
api.description: Powerful REST API to automate link creation within your own applications.

expiration.title: Flexible Expiry
expiration.description: Set links to live forever or schedule them to self-destruct after a specific time.

security.title: Security Verification
security.description: Warns users when they access websites that do not comply with security standards.

open_source.title: Open Source
open_source.description: Fully transparent redirection logic. Audit the code, host it yourself.
